channel.title: PvP Clan Throwing Together
channel.description:
Ok guys so basically I wanted to start a PvP clan and was wondering if anyone wanted to join. Especially with the new citadel update coming out I think It will be epic. But I want to start PvPing as soon as possible. We also need a name, so anyone who join... Ideas? Im currently 100 CB lvl and will probably base the requirements around there, as 100 + is usually a good level to start pvping at in clan wars. So heres the requirements, it wont be TOO exclusive :P.
- CB lvl 95+ (may have exceptions) - Members ONLY clan - Be respectful and Mature
Not even much of requirement list. And if you suck at PvP , dont be afraid to join and ask for help, i'm more then willing to help :P, though im not an expert, ill give it my best shot to help you out. I appreciate any and all people who want to join. Thanks for reading this and have a nice day :P.

item.title: PvP Clan Throwing Together
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Sparc I Am Sparc
item.description:
@I_Am_Sparc wrote:

Yeah but, that vexillum shit, all of it honestly spams the world map. There’s a statue or an imp left and right, swear to god … sigh anyways, hate all you want people i want city pking back! FTW
